name: Halfords Advanced 23cm D Lock
keys: 1 LED light key for night use
features: Hardened steel casing to protect against drill attacks
description: The Halfords Advanced 23cm D Lock is our first 10/10 rated lock. Featuring hardened steel casing to protect against drill attacks, anti-pick locking mechanisms, and an ultra-hardened steel shackle, this lock is designed to fight against prying, jacking, and cutting attacks. It is also our first Diamond Sold Secure lock, the highest certification granted to bike locks in the UK. Sold Secure is a third-party, independent testing facility run by the Master Locksmiths Association.

name: Hiplok ANKR
securityRating: Sold Secure Bicycle and Motorcycle Gold
features: Maximum security wall and ground anchor
Compatible with chain and D locks
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
description: Designed for use with Hiplok’s high-security chain and D locks, the all-new Hiplok ANKR is the first bike security anchor with a unique easy-fit design. Independently tested and awarded the maximum Gold Level Security for both motorbikes and bicycles by Sold Secure, ANKR is perfect for inside or outside use. ANKR’s multiple fixing holes allow for mounting on a variety of floor and wall surfaces. Its unique design allows for maximum security without the need for permanent bolts, meaning ANKR is both easy to install and can also be moved to a different location if required at a later date.

name: Hiplok Gold - Wearable Bike Lock
features: Wearable design for comfort during journeys
Removable sleeve with reflective chevron detail
description: The Hiplok Gold wearable bike lock is the ultimate wearable lock. With a Sold Secure rating of Gold, this lock offers maximum security in all areas. For what it offers in security, it doesn't lack in comfort, with a patented Pending Unique Clip Feature and wearable design, this lock is great for all journeys.
